Key Match Events: The Kings beat the Celtics at their own game by making more threes than them
DeMar DeRozan scored 12 points and delivered 4 assists in the 4th quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings have been the best rebounding team in the NBA lately
The Kings have been a great defensive team since Doug Christie took over as head coach
Others: The Celtics struggled on pick-and-roll defense
Jayson Tatum struggled against the blitz
Jaylen Brown had a good game despite an off night from three
The Celtics' offensive execution in the 4th quarter was poor
